Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.name: WF_MEDIA

children.displayName: Provide barcode for media load operation
children.name: INP_MEDIA_BARCODE

children.displayName: Provide media side id (Fetch 'mediaid' from mediaId table against barcode entry)
children.name: INP_MEDIASIDE

children.displayName: Provide media agent associated with the barcode entry
children.name: INP_MEDIAAGENT

children.displayName: Provide barcode for marking media bad
children.name: INP_BARCODE_MARKBAD

children.displayName: Provide barcode for marking media full
children.name: INP_BARCODE_MARKFULL

children.displayName: Provide email id for sending reports
children.name: INP_EMAIL_ID

children.displayName: Pause workflow in verify process block?
children.name: INP_PAUSE_VERIFY

children.displayName: Pause workflow in media append process block?
children.name: INP_PAUSE_MEDIA_MARKAPPEND

children.displayName: Pause workflow in allow media export process block?
children.name: INP_PAUSE_MEDIA_ALLOWEXPORT

children.displayName: Pause workflow in media load operation?
children.name: INP_PAUSE_MEDIA_LOAD

children.displayName: Pause workflow for marking media bad
children.name: INP_PAUSE_MEDIA_MARKBAD

children.displayName: Pause workflow in media mark full process block?
children.name: INP_PAUSE_MEDIA_MARKFULL

inputs.val:
<inputs><script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED"))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}" /></inputs>

<inputs><IIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/IIIIIIIIIIII}</IIIIIIIIIIII><INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_EMAIL_ID}</INP_EMAIL_ID><INP_PAUSE_WF_START class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_PAUSE_WF_START}</INP_PAUSE_WF_START><INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE}</INP_LOG_EVENT_MESSAGE><INP_LOG_SEVERITY class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">xpath:{/workflow/inputs/INP_LOG_SEVERITY}</INP_LOG_SEVERITY><INP_SEND_EMAIL class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false" /><INP_CHECK class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_CHECK></inputs>
